sentences.en: a vigorous campaign against tax fraud
As Parretti walked across the tarmac, fraud officers closed in.
sentences.cn: 当帕雷蒂穿过柏油路的时候，反欺诈警察围了上去。

sentences.en: Auditors said they had uncovered evidence of fraud.
sentences.cn: 审计人员说他们已经发现了欺诈的证据。

sentences.en: Chip and PIN is designed to combat credit card fraud.
sentences.cn: 智能卡系统是专为防止信用卡诈骗设计的。

sentences.en: Fraud is an entirely different matter.
sentences.cn: 欺诈完全是另外一回事。

sentences.en: He is a big cheese in the Art Fraud Squad.
sentences.cn: 他是反艺术诈骗专案组的重要人物。

sentences.en: He is working in tandem with officials of the Serious Fraud Office.
sentences.cn: 他正配合欺诈重案办公室的官员工作。

sentences.en: He's probably going to finish up in jail for business fraud.
sentences.cn: 他最后很可能会因为商业诈骗而入狱。

sentences.en: Her assistant was accused of theft and fraud by the police.
sentences.cn: 她的助手被警方指控犯有盗窃和欺诈罪。

sentences.en: Other charges include fraud and illegal appropriation of land.
sentences.cn: 其他指控包括欺诈罪和非法侵占土地罪。

sentences.en: Prosecutors may soon seek an indictment on racketeering and fraud charges.
sentences.cn: 检举官可能不久就会以敲诈勒索与欺诈罪名提起诉讼。

sentences.en: Secret investigations have netted ninety staff suspected of fraud and theft.
sentences.cn: 秘密调查已抓获90名涉嫌欺诈盗窃的职员。

sentences.en: She was found guilty of fraud.
Two other executives appeared at Worthing Magistrates' Court charged with tax fraud.
sentences.cn: 又有两个经理因偷税漏税指控被传唤到沃辛治安法庭。

sentences.en: Unluckily for him, the fraud officers were watching this flight too.
sentences.cn: 对他而言不幸的是，那些反诈骗官员也在密切注视着这个航班。

sentences.en: When his fraud was rumbled he had just £20.17 in the bank.
sentences.cn: 当他的欺诈行为被发现时，他的银行账户上只有20.17英镑。

trans.tran_cn: 欺诈，骗子，伪劣品，冒牌货
trans.tran_en: the crime of deceiving people in order to gain something such as money or goods
